title.en-US: Empower Your Website Development Process through Enterprise AI Integration (1)

summary.en-US: Explore how AnswerAI can revolutionize education through our story about Harrison, a 13-year-old who used AI to code a game in a day. Discover the power of AI in teaching and learning, and join us in creating a future where every student can unlock their full potential.

content.value: In the evolving educational landscape, AI technologies like AnswerAI are playing an instrumental role in redefining learning experiences. Today, we will share a fascinating story about a teenager, who, under the mentorship of AnswerAI's CEO Brad Taylor, used AnswerAI to create his very own video game – all in a single day, starting from scratch!
Coming Up with the Game Concepts - Ideation with Journeys

At just 13 years olds, Harrison had never written a line of code before he stepped into the world of AnswerAI. Harrison loved playing video games and talked about wanting to make them in the future when he grew up. So I decided to invite him over one Sunday and show him how he could learn to create one now using AI. It went far better than I could have imagined.

Harrison decided to create a video game titled World at War, the first step for Harrison was to ideate on the game's concept. This is where AnswerAI's Journeys came into play. Journeys acted as a project roadmap, helping him visualize and structure his game's concept from ideation to execution, breaking down the overarching project into manageable tasks. This is the power of AI in education.
Creating Graphic Prompts and Coding - Execution with Sidekicks

Next, Harrison needed to create the graphics for his game. Crafting effective image prompts can be challenging, but with AnswerAI's Sidekicks, this process became incredibly straightforward. A Midjourney Sidekick guided Harrison in generating creative and effective image prompts for his game's graphics.

Once he had the graphics ready, it was time to dive into coding. Harrison used AnswerAI to generate the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript required for his game. Despite his lack of prior coding knowledge, the coding Sidekicks helped him understand the fundamental concepts of these programming languages, making the learning curve less daunting.
A Day's Transformation - From Novice to Game Developer

By the end of the day, Harrison had a general understanding of key coding concepts such as variables, functions, and switch-case statements, demonstrating the vast potential of learning with AnswerAI. And he didn't just learn about these concepts – he applied them in creating his own video game, World at War, a remarkable achievement for a single day's work. Not to mention we even got some Zelda time in as well showing him you truly can balance work with fun.

From knowing nothing about coding to developing a fully functional game, Harrison's story is a testament to AnswerAI's educational potential. You can view the source code and play Harrison's game here.
Controls
A: Left
D: Right
W: Jump
Space: Fire
My high score is 7 coins! How many can you get?
A Call to Action for Educators
We invite educators worldwide to harness the power of AnswerAI,

in their teaching journey. We're committed to working closely with schools to create a safe and stimulating environment for students to interact with AI. It’s more than just a tool - it’s an opportunity for students to acquire valuable skills that will be increasingly crucial in the near future.
Let's take a step together towards a future where every student can unlock their full potential, just like Harrison, using the power of AnswerAI.

value.text: Include the primary keyword 'Enterprise AI' and secondary keyword 'Website Development' in the title and body of the blog post.
value.reasoning: By incorporating the main keywords in the title and body of the blog post, you will improve the SEO optimization and make it easier for users to find the article when searching for related topics.

value.text: Utilize subheadings with keywords to break down the content and improve readability and SEO optimization.
value.reasoning: Subheadings with relevant keywords can help search engines understand the content better and improve the overall structure of the blog post for readers.

value.text: Add meta tags and descriptions with targeted keywords to enhance the visibility of the blog post in search engine results.
value.reasoning: Meta tags and descriptions play a crucial role in SEO by giving search engines more information about the content of the page, which can lead to higher rankings and click-through rates.

value.text: Include internal links to related articles or resources on Enterprise AI and Website Development to increase user engagement and improve SEO.
value.reasoning: Internal linking helps users navigate through your website and discover more relevant content, while also signaling to search engines the importance of specific pages within your site.

value.text: Encourage social sharing and engagement by adding social media buttons and calls to action at the end of the blog post.
value.reasoning: By incorporating social sharing buttons and calls to action, you can expand the reach of your content through social platforms and increase user interaction, which can positively impact SEO rankings.

value.reasoning: Meta tags are crucial for SEO, as they provide search engines with information about the content of the page. This will help improve the visibility of the blog post in search results.

value.reasoning: Internal linking helps in building a hierarchy within the website and spreads ranking power throughout the site. It also keeps users engaged and encourages them to explore more content.

value.text: Optimize images with appropriate alt text containing relevant keywords.
value.reasoning: Alt text helps search engines understand the content of images on a page. By using keywords in alt text, the blog post can enhance its SEO and visibility in image search results.

value.text: Implement a clear and concise meta description that includes key information about the blog post's content.
value.reasoning: A well-crafted meta description can attract users to click on the link when it appears in search results. It should provide a brief overview of the blog post and entice users to read more.
